subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: With his 44 points, 10 assists and 8 rebounds in Game 2 against the Heat, point guard Rajon Rondo asserted his place in Boston’s plans for seasons to come.
snippet: With his 44 points, 10 assists and 8 rebounds in Game 2 against the Heat, point guard Rajon Rondo asserted his place in Boston’s plans for seasons to come.
